data.name: The Monstrous Horror Show
data.detailed_description:
The Monstrous Horror Show is a survival horror game developed by Kaniheadcrab and published by OTAKU Plan.

STORY

In an abandoned hospital, four young girls gathered here for their own reasons and began to explore the hidden secrets of the hospital.
Can they escape safely and return to their normal peaceful daily life again?

GAMEPLAY

This game is a survival horror, adventure RPG.
Players need to find key documents in the game, solve the puzzle, and avoid or confront monstrous creatures.
Let's escape from this abandoned hospital!

FEATURES

  • Amazing pixel arts
  • 4 different heroines with 4 different aspects of the story to choose from
  • Puzzle solving
  • Horrible & bizarre effect

data.short_description: In an abandoned hospital, four young girls gathered here for their own reasons and began to explore the hidden secrets of the hospital. Can they escape safely and return to their normal peaceful daily life again?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
